metadata.title: Japan - US Cooperative Longline Survey of the Aleutian Region, Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska

creators.name: National Research Institute of Far Seas Fisheries, Shimizu, Japan

metadata.description: Annual longline resource assessment surveys aboard chartered Japanese vessels; data catch by species; size compositions for principle species; catch and some size composition.  Available by pre-assigned depth strata.  Data collected at more or less fixed index sites, 100 - 1,000 m  depths in the Aleutian Islands, Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Assess sablefish and Pacific cod populations and monitor changes in abundance and size compositions.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
